content.rendered:
Directed by Nitesh Tiwari.

Written by Piyush Gupta. Nikhil Mehrotra. Nitesh Tiwari.

Cast Sushant Singh Rajput(Anirudh Pathak aka Anni). Shraddha Kapoor(Maya). Varun Sharma(Gurmeet ‘Sexa’ Singh Dhillon). Prateik Babbar(Raggie (as Prateik)). Tahir Raj Bhasin(Derek). Naveen Polishetty(Acid). Tushar Pandey(Mummy). Saharsh Kumar Shukla(Bevda). Rohit Chauhan(Chriss Cross). Nalneesh Neel(H4 Chef Pandu). Aashray Batra(Raghav’s senior). Abhinav Bhattacharjee(Dard Kumar (as Abhinaba Bhattacharjee)). Ajoy Chakraborty(Professor Gulati). Anud Singh Dhaka(H4 student). Shaji Dheeraj(Hostel Staff). Neil Dhokte(Maradona). Amrit Kashyap(Dismissed Batsman). Vattanak Khun(Garry). Rudrashish Majumder(Bagula Freshie). Kamaal Malik(Professor Mishra). Akshay Neb(Pele). Saurabh Pal(Pharmacy guy). Abhilasha Patil(Nurse). Arun Raj(Gessoo). Hiren Rathod(Student). Ashleigh Sendin(Sharon (Secretary)). Belal Shanu(Kabaddi Team Captain). Shishir Sharma(Doctor Kasbekar). Nitin Kumar Singh(H4B Fish Freshie) . Anuj Ahluwalia(Bio reader). Vijay Chand Thakur((credit only)). Abishek Joseph George(Venkatesh). Sanjay Goradia(Mummy’s father). Vishal Gupta(Kabaddi Asthama). Md Anan Islam(College Student). Prasad Jawade(Father in Train (as Prasad Jawde)). Sumit Khanna(Sumit Khanna (as Sumit khanna for Scripts Writing Credits)). Shashank Mishra(Nitish Tiwari). Devtosh Mukherjee(Hostel Friend).Anup Pathade. Pkaushikji(Friend). Shruti Puranik(Mother in Train). Ranjan Raj(Danda / Abhimanyu Rathore). Mohammad Samad(Raghav). Bondip Sarma(Anni’s friend). Harsh Shashwat(Media promoter). Deependra Singh(Tea stall owner). Saanand Verma(Clerk)

Language Hindi.

Producers Kavan Ahalpara. Vighnesh Chendwankar. Yash Gupta. Sajid Nadiadwala. Ajay Rai. Ankur B. Saraiya. Sudipto Sarkar. Shantanu Tungare.

Production Fox STAR Studios. Fox STAR Studios. Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
